name: Wish Upon An Egg
description:
Wish Upon An Egg is a 2D platformer x visual novel. This is a cute and relaxing game, where the Princess herself is the hero who saves the day!

After accidentally waking up a cute egg boy from his century-long hibernation, Yoko finds out that he needs to develop human emotions and empathy to break the seal. She must explore the ancient ruins of the once-powerful Yolken Empire to collect energy crystals so she can talk to him and break his seal. 

FEATURES

  • Consistent egg theme
  • 3 egg-citing platform levels
  • Cute animated enemies and player character
  • Approximately 1500 words 
  • Ambient, lo-fi soundtrack and SFX
  • Fantasy, romance, slice of life genre
This game was completely designed and developed in 7 weeks for a University project

THE TEAM

Designed Developed by Boiled Egg Studios

Artists:

UI, character, enemies, weapons, animation, voice-overs

Environment, backgrounds, tiles, props, UI, cinematic

Character, animation, visual novel art, menu and promotion

Composer, sound design, voice overs, dialogue system, level design

Joshua Bell

Player movement, enemy AI, animation, sine wave
